# Inference
First, upload necessary package(s).
```{r}
library(tidyverse) #also has dplyr
```
## 2.7 Exercises 

```{r}
dir <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/genomicsclass/dagdata/master/inst/extdata/"
filename <- "femaleControlsPopulation.csv"
url <- paste0(dir, filename)
x <- unlist(read.csv(url))
```

Or if you already have downloaded the data, then just upload it.

```{r}
x <- read.csv('femaleMiceWeights.csv') %>% unlist()
```

Check out what unlist does by typing ?unlist in the command. 
### Question 1

<div class="question">
What is the average of these weights?
</div>

<div class="answer">

```{r}
mean(x)
```
